item.title: Boeing CEO lays out recovery plan after company's biggest annual loss since 2020
item.description: Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg faces investors after the beleaguered company posts its sixth annual loss.

item.title: GM beats Wall Street estimates, forecasts another year of strong earnings in 2025
item.description: While investors will be watching GM's quarterly results, they will also be focused on its guidance for 2025 and any changes under the Trump administra...

item.title: Restaurants are rebounding â€” but Starbucks and McDonald's still have work to do
item.description: Starbucks and McDonald's could disappoint investors, but investors are expecting better performance from the restaurant industry.

item.title: Budget airline Ryanair cuts passenger traffic goal again on Boeing delays
item.description: Budget airline Ryanair on Monday reported stronger-than-expected after-tax profit for the three months through to the end of December.

item.title: Twilio shares pop 20% for biggest gain since Covid pandemic on growth forecast
item.description: Twilio shares had their sharpest rally since 2020 on Friday after the company issued an uplifting forecast for the coming years at an investor event.
